body_html:
According to that the only difference is in mean and var estimates, but the formula is the same.
The example above is constructed to make the running mean and variance exactly match those of the batch. Yet there is a difference. Please reopen the issue.

body:
According to that the only difference is in mean and var estimates, but the formula is the same.
The example above is constructed to make the running mean and variance exactly match those of the batch. Yet there is a difference. Please reopen the issue.
